title: Kwado Temple Orbital - Sonye na Ozi
heading: Kwado Temple Orbital
vision: Na Nọvemba 28, 2025 , Orbital Temple ga-esi India malite n'ụgbọ rọketi ISRO . Satellite nka na-ekere òkè sitere na Global South, ọ bụ ihe ncheta maka nsonye radical, ikpo okwu maka agụmakwụkwọ, yana ihe na-akpali mkparịta ụka zuru ụwa ọnụ banyere ọdịnihu nke ihe dị nsọ na afọ nke teknụzụ, AI na nyocha mbara igwe.
videoCaption: Okwu mmalite vidiyo Temple Orbital, 1 min.

accomplished.heading: Ihe Anyị Mezuru
accomplished.content: Mgbe afọ anọ nke nyocha na mmepe, ozi dị njikere. Anyị emechaala ngwaike na ngwanrọ maka satịlaịtị, gafere ule shaker gọọmentị achọrọ maka asambodo ụgbọ elu, wee mechaa nkwekọrịta anyị na ISRO. Ewubere satịlaịtị. Teknụzụ na-arụ ọrụ. A kpochapụrụ anyị maka mmalite.

needs.heading: Ihe Anyị chọrọ nkwado maka
needs.intro: Iji mezue ọrụ akụkọ ihe mere eme nke a wee bulie mmetụta ya, anyị chọrọ nkwado maka akụkụ ise dị oke mkpa:

decade.heading: Afọ iri na-abịa
decade.intro: Ozi a anaghị akwụsị na Nọvemba 28, 2025. Ọ ka na-amalite.
decade.paragraph1: N'ime afọ 10 na-esote, satịlaịtị a ga-agba gburugburu ụwa, na-aza aha ndị ezitere site n'akụkụ ọ bụla nke mbara ala. Mmemme mmụta a chọrọ ịzụ ọtụtụ puku ndị nọ n'afọ iri na ụma na teknụzụ satịlaịtị, na-emebi oghere oghere maka South South. Ihe nkiri a ga-eru nde mmadụ n'ụwa niile, na-akpali mkparịta ụka gbasara inwe, ncheta na ihe dị nsọ.
decade.paragraph2: Templelọ nsọ Orbital na Sathi Roy na The Roy Foundation na-emekọrịta ihe iji mee ka ọhụụ afọ iri a dị mkpa n'ọdịnala. Roy Foundation bụ onye anaghị akwụ ụgwọ raara onwe ya nye ịgbasa ohere mmụta ime mmụọ, ọgwụgwọ mmetụta uche, na ngwaọrụ njiri mara maka obodo ndị na-enweghị nchekwa n'ụwa niile, na-ejikọta amamihe oge ochie na teknụzụ ọgbara ọhụrụ iji mepụta ụwa mara mma, njikọ na ọmịiko. Ọnụ, anyị na-ewu akụrụngwa iji hụ na Temple Orbital ga-abụ mmegharị na-adịgide adịgide na-erute obodo n'ofe ụwa.
decade.paragraph3: Nkwado gị abụghị naanị inye ego mmalite; ọ na-emepụta mmegharị nke ga-emegharị maka afọ iri ma kpalie ọgbọ ọzọ nke ndị na-ese ihe na ndị injinia.

individualDonations.heading: Onyinye onye ọ bụla
individualDonations.intro: Soro ozi a n'ọkwa na-arụ ọrụ maka gị. Ndị na-akwado onye ọ bụla bụ ntọala nke ọrụ akụkọ ihe mere eme a.

orbitalFriend.title: Enyi Orbital
orbitalFriend.benefits: Ị na-enweta: Aha n'akwụkwọ mpịakọta nsọpụrụ webụsaịtị · Asambodo orbital ahaziri iche mgbe satịlaịtị malitere · Akwụkwọ akụkọ ekele gị · nnata enweghị ike ịwepụ ụtụ isi
orbitalFriend.button: Nye onyinye a ga-ewepụ ụtụ isi

satelliteSupporter.title: Onye na-akwado Satellite
satelliteSupporter.benefits: Ị na-enweta: Uru Enyi Orbital niile · Nweta ngwa nleba anya satịlaịtị pụrụ iche · Onye na-ese ihe na-ekele gị ozi vidiyo · Nnata anaghị ewepụ ụtụ isi
satelliteSupporter.button: Nye onyinye a ga-ewepụ ụtụ isi

spaceAdvocate.title: Onye na-akwado oghere
spaceAdvocate.benefits: Ị na-enweta: Uru niile na-akwado Satellite · Aha ebipụtara n'akwụkwọ kredit akwụkwọ · Ọkpọku maka nyocha akwụkwọ nkeonwe · Mmelite nke otu ụzọ n'ụzọ anọ.
spaceAdvocate.button: Nye onyinye a ga-ewepụ ụtụ isi

fundingOpportunities.heading: Tinye ego maka akụrụngwa akọwapụtara
fundingOpportunities.intro: Ntinye aka gị na-akwado kpọmkwem akụkụ nke ozi ahụ. Họrọ ihe na-agwa gị okwu, ma ọ bụ jikọta ọtụtụ iji mepụta mmetụta ka ukwuu.

launch.title: Ego maka mmalite oghere
launch.description: Ọnụ mmalite mmalite ahụ n'ime rọketi ISRO na Nọvemba 28, 2025 . Nke a na-eziga Temple Orbital n'ime orbit, ebe ọ ga-anọ ruo afọ iri dị ka satịlaịtị nka na-ekere òkè na ụlọ nsọ dị na mbara igwe, nke onye ọ bụla nọ n'ụwa nwere ike ịnweta.
launch.benefits: Ị na-enweta: "Mwepụta nkwado" aha · Egopụtara na mwepụta niile nke akwụkwọ akụkọ · Nkwenye akwụkwọ na ihuenyo · Ịnweta VIP ibido mmemme · Soro Edson na ndị otu ndị ozi sonyere oku vidiyo nkeji iri na ise · Asambodo nwere data orbital satịlaịtị · Nnata a na-ewepụ ụtụ isi
launch.button: Nye onyinye a ga-ewepụ ụtụ isi

travel.title: Ego njem ndị nka na India
travel.description: Njem, ebe obibi, na ọnụ ahịa mmepụta maka onye na-ese ihe Edson Pavoni na ndị otu bụ isi iji gbaa akaebe mmalite na India na Nọvemba 28, 2025 . Njem a dị mkpa maka ịse ihe nkiri, mgbasa ozi mgbasa ozi, na ịnọchite anya South South n'oge akụkọ ihe mere eme a.
travel.benefits: Ị na-enweta: Ekele nkeonwe site n'aka onye na-ese ihe · Nnweta akwụkwọ n'azụ ihe nkiri · Aha na kredit akwụkwọ
travel.button: Nye onyinye a ga-ewepụ ụtụ isi

carbon.title: Tinye ego maka mmemme mbelata carbon
carbon.description: A ga-ewepụ ikuku carbon niile, gụnyere mgbawa rọketi na imepụta satịlaịtị. Anyị na-arụ ọrụ na mmemme nkwụghachi ụgwọ carbon elele anya iji hụ na ọrụ a na-ahapụ enweghị akara ukwu gburugburu ebe obibi na-adịghị mma.
carbon.benefits: Ị na-enweta: Aha n'akwụkwọ nsọpụrụ webụsaịtị · Asambodo ahaziri onwe ya · Akwụkwọ nnata enweghị ike iwepụ ụtụ isi
carbon.button: Nye onyinye a ga-ewepụ ụtụ isi

education.title: Ego mmemme mmụta
education.description: Zụlite ma malite usoro ọmụmụ asụsụ ọtụtụ asụsụ zuru oke na-akụziri ndị ntorobịa Global South otu esi arụ satịlaịtị. Gụnyere mmepe usoro ọmụmụ, mmepụta vidiyo, nnabata ikpo okwu, na afọ mbụ nke scholarships maka ụmụ akwụkwọ enweghị nchekwa. Na-emepụta akụrụngwa na-adịgide adịgide maka mmụta ohere.
education.benefits: Ị na-enweta: "Education Founding Sponsor" nkwado · scholarships n'aha gị · A na-egosipụta na akwụkwọ agụmakwụkwọ · Zute ndị otu mbụ nke ụmụ akwụkwọ ego mmụta gị kwadoro (nke ọma ma ọ bụ n'ime mmadụ) · Akụkụ akụkụ akwụkwọ akụkọ · ohere ikwu okwu na mmemme mmalite · Ịkwụ ụgwọ ụtụ isi.
education.button: Nye onyinye a ga-ewepụ ụtụ isi

docPreProd.title: Nweta ego tupu mmepụta akwụkwọ
docPreProd.description: Ego nke mbụ nke "Gịnị Na-eme Ụlọ Nsọ?" akwụkwọ. Gụnyere ịme ajụjụ ọnụ dị omimi 2 na India na ndị isi echiche na ndị na-eme mmụọ, obere njem na mmepụta ihe, na idezi ihe nkiri tupu ewepụtara. Usoro a na-eguzobe ntọala akwụkwọ akụkọ ma kwado ntụziaka okike.
docPreProd.benefits: Ị na-enweta: kredit Associate Producer · Aha na kredit akwụkwọ
docPreProd.button: Nye onyinye a ga-ewepụ ụtụ isi

docProd.title: Ego maka mmepụta akwụkwọ
docProd.description: Mmepụta zuru oke na mmepụta nke "Gịnị Na-eme Ụlọ Nsọ?" , akwụkwọ akụkọ nke na-enyocha njikọ nke nka, teknụzụ, na ihe dị nsọ. Gụnyere ịse ihe nkiri n'ọtụtụ mba, ajụjụ ọnụ ndị ọzọ na ndị isi echiche, ndezi zuru oke, akara agba, imewe ụda, na nyocha izizi na India na NYC .
docProd.benefits: Ị na-enweta: Executive Producer credit · Nke a na-egosi na mmeghe kredit · Nleba anya nkeonwe maka ndị ọbịa gị · Akwụkwọ ịkpọ òkù ụwa (obodo abụọ ahụ) · Nri abalị nkeonwe ya na Edson na onye ntụzi akwụkwọ akụkọ tupu mmalite mmalite · Nnweta n'azụ ihe nkiri · Nnata a na-ewepụ ụtụ isi
docProd.button: Nye onyinye a ga-ewepụ ụtụ isi

artCollector.title: Bụrụ naanị Onye na-anakọta nka Temple Orbital
artCollector.imageAlt: Nrụnye ụlọ nsọ Orbital na Mercosul Biennial
artCollector.imageCaption: Templelọ nsọ Orbital na 13th Mercosul Biennial, Porto Alegre. Foto nke Clara Marques.
artCollector.paragraph1: Ewuru satịlaịtị atọ yiri ya maka ọrụ a. Otu ga-amalite na mbara igwe na Nọvemba 28, 2025. Otu na-aga na ihe ngosi ngosi nka n'ụwa nile. Edebere otu maka onye na-anakọta mmesapụ aka nke chọrọ itinye ego n'ọhụụ a ma nwee akụkụ akụkọ ihe mere eme nka.
artCollector.paragraph2: Nke a abụghị oyiri; ọ bụ otu n'ime satịlaịtị atọ mbụ. Ụgbọ elu na-arụ ọrụ zuru oke nke bụkwa ihe ọkpụkpụ . Satịlaịtị ahụ ruru 5cm³ ma tụọ 245g nwere otu dome ejiri ọla edo mee.
artCollector.paragraph4: Dị ka onye nchịkọta, ị ga-enweta otu nrụnye ahụ e kere maka 13th Mercosul Biennial , ihe ngosi museological zuru ezu nke na-egosi satịlaịtị dị ka nkà na nkà na ụzụ. Egosipụtala nrụnye a na nnukwu ebe mba ụwa ma na-anọchite anya ọkwa kachasị elu nke ngosi nka oghere.
artCollector.paragraph5: Nkwado gị na-enyere aka ịkwado ọhụụ dum: mmalite, mmemme mmụta, na akwụkwọ akụkọ nke ga-eme ka mkparịta ụka zuru ụwa ọnụ gbasara ihe dị nsọ n'oge nkà na ụzụ, AI na nchọpụta mbara igwe. Aha gị ga-ejikọta ya na ọrụ akụkọ ihe mere eme.

gratitude.heading: Site n'ekele nye ndị na-akwado anyị
gratitude.intro: Ụlọ nsọ Orbital bụ ụlọ ọrụ, ndị mmadụ n'otu n'otu, na ndị kwere ekwe na nsonye dị egwu na-aghọta na nka na-emepụta echiche echi.

pearmill.title: Onye nkwado ntọala
pearmill.description: Pearmill bụ otu n'ime ụlọ ọrụ azụmaahịa na-eto ngwa ngwa na US, otu ndị na-emepụta ihe, ndị na-ere ahịa, na ndị injinia na-arụkọ ọrụ ọnụ iji nyere aka itolite ụfọdụ mmalite mmalite kachasị mma n'ụwa. Nkwado mmesapụ aka ha nyere ndị otu Orbital Temple aka ịzụta ihe ndị dị oke mkpa ma mepụta ngwaike mepere emepe nke na-eme ka ọrụ satịlaịtị a kwe omume.

gratitude.yourName: Aha gị nwere ike ịbụ ebe a. Soro anyị mepụta akụkọ ihe mere eme.

people.heading: Ndị nọ n'azụ ozi a
people.intro: Templelọ nsọ Orbital bụ nkwa afọ 10. Ọ bụ ndị mmadụ abụọ jirila ndụ ha jikọọ nka, teknụzụ na njikọ mmadụ na-eduzi ya, na ndị na-ewu akụrụngwa iji kwado ọhụụ a maka afọ iri n'ihu.

edson.name: Edson Pavoni
edson.paragraph1: Edson bụ onye na-ese ihe na teknụzụ nke na-enyocha mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya na njikọ nka na teknụzụ. Omume ya gụnyere nrụnye ihe owuwu, uri, foto, na teknụzụ satịlaịtị.
edson.paragraph2: Egosiputala ọrụ ya na 13th Mercosul Biennial (Brazil), IX International Biennale (Uzbekistan), na NTU Global Digital Art Prize (Singapore).
edson.paragraph3: N'ihe karịrị afọ 20 na ngalaba nka na teknụzụ , ya na ndị otu okike rụkọrọ ọrụ maka 2016 Rio Olympics na Inter American Development Bank . Akpọrọ ya otu n'ime ndị ọkachamara 50 kachasị ọhụrụ nke Brazil site na Proxxima Magazine, ọ natara akara ngosi IF Design Awards abụọ n'usoro (2017-2018) ma bụrụ onye mmeri Lumen Prize Futures Award . E gosipụtara ọrụ ya n'ime afọ abụọ ma gosipụta ya na Ludwig Museum of Contemporary Art (Budapest), Inhotim Institute (Brazil), na Design and Fashion Museum (Lisbon), na ihe ngosi na New York, Beijing, Singapore, Dubai, Rio de Janeiro, na obodo ndị ọzọ.

sathi.name: Sathi Roy
sathi.role: Onye guzobere, Roy Foundation & Strategic Partner
sathi.paragraph1: Sathi bụ onye nchoputa nke The Roy Foundation , onye anaghị akwụ ụgwọ maka ịgbasa ohere inweta mmụta ime mmụọ, ọgwụgwọ mmetụta uche, na ngwaọrụ nsụhọ maka obodo ndị na-enweghị nchebe gburugburu ụwa. Ntọala ahụ na ụlọ akwụkwọ, ụlọ ọrụ omenala, na ndị otu mpaghara na-emekọrịta ihe iji kesaa ngwaọrụ ọdịmma AI kwadoro, usoro ọmụmụ obodo, na mgbasa ozi nke na-akpali mgbanwe.
sathi.paragraph2: Site na nzụlite na neuroscience, nkuzi, na onye ndu, Sathi ewulitela ma duru ndị otu gafee North America na India, na-ewepụta $ 600 nde na ahịa kwa afọ n'otu ọrụ. Ọ bụkwa onye nchoputa nke OHM , a digital-first spirit movement, Co-Founder of SUTE (a digital AI-driven office platform), ma na-eje ozi dị ka Advisor na Global Head of Growth for RISE Global Creative .
sathi.paragraph3: Dị ka nwanyị Bengali-American nke na-ejikọta nkà ihe ọmụma Ọwụwa Anyanwụ na ọdịda anyanwụ, Sathi na-eweta echiche pụrụ iche na mmegharị ime mmụọ na nka na narị afọ 21st. Site na netwọkụ na-eto eto nke ndị na-eso ụzọ 65,000+ yana ihe karịrị nde 40 n'ịntanetị , ọ na-ewu obodo zuru ụwa ọnụ nke jikọtara n'ofe ọdịnala na nke mmụọ.

people.together: Tinyere Roy Foundation, anyị na-arụ ọrụ afọ 10 nke na-ejikọta nka, teknụzụ, agụmakwụkwọ na ihe dị nsọ, na-amalite site na mwepụta satịlaịtị na Nọvemba 28, 2025, ma na-aga n'ihu na mmegharị nke ga-erute obodo ndị na-enweghị nchekwa n'ụwa niile ma kpalie ọgbọ na-abịa.

join.heading: Sonyere anyị
join.content: Ewubere satịlaịtị. Teknụzụ dị njikere. Edebere ụbọchị mwepụta: Nọvemba 28, 2025 . Nke a bụ oge isonye na ozi na-echegharị ihe nka nwere ike ime, ebe ọ nwere ike ịga na ndị ọ ga-eje ozi.

fundSpecific.heading: Tinye ego maka akụrụngwa akọwapụtara ma ọ bụ bụrụ onye mmekọ tọrọ ntọala
fundSpecific.description: Họrọ otu n'ime ohere ego dị n'elu, jụọ maka ịghọ onye na-anakọta nka, ma ọ bụ kparịta nkwado omenala nke dabara n'ọhụụ gị.

generalDonation.heading: Nye onyinye a ga-ewepụ ụtụ isi
generalDonation.description: Onyinye niile, nnukwu ma ọ bụ obere, na-akwado ọrụ ahụ ma bụrụ nke a na-ewepụ ụtụ isi site na onye nkwado ego anyị, The Field.

taxInfo.heading: Inye ihe n'ụtụ isi
taxInfo.paragraph1: Templelọ nsọ Orbital bụ ọrụ nkwado ego nke The Field (Performance Zone Inc.) , otu 501(c)(3) ọgbakọ anaghị akwụ ụgwọ dabere na New York. A na-ewepụ ụtụ isi nke US niile ruo n'ókè iwu kwere.
taxInfo.paragraph2:
Ubi
75 Maiden Lane, Suite 906
New York, NY 10038
ebe.org
taxInfo.paragraph3: Mgbe ị na-enye onyinye site na ndenye ego, biko were ndetu: "Edson Pavoni: Orbital Temple" kwụọ ụgwọ na Performance Zone Inc.
